keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are the only party to set out a clear plan to fund the NHS. A penny on income tax for the NHS will ease the pressure on NHS staff and patients until long-term solutions can be found.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only a vote for the Lib Dems is a vote of confidence in our NHS.

issues.government: Our NHS is in your hands. Five more years of Theresa May’s Conservatives will give them free reign for more and more NHS cuts.
issues.health: One of our proudest institutions is being damaged by a desperate quest for privatisation by Theresa May’s Conservatives. Our beloved NHS is at breaking point. This winter saw the worst ever crisis for A&E departments. 1.2 million of our elderly people are not getting the care they need. 15% of operations are cancelled.

leaflet.personalStatement: The NHS has been my life. I started work as a doctor in 1982. For nearly 35 years, I’ve proudly served our NHS. In 2010 I rose to become the Chair of the Royal College of GPs. But I resigned from this position in 2015. It was one of the toughest things I’ve ever had to do, but I couldn’t stay quiet any longer.

politicalExperience.role: Chair of the Royal College of General Practitioners

Five more years of Theresa May’s Conservatives will give them free reign for more and more NHS cuts.
